base.ents

Interface ICharBrain

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EnemyBrain, InputSampler, NullBrain

    public interface ICharBrain
    Instructs Ent_Chars how to move

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean fire2Weapon(Ent_Gun wep) 
      boolean fireWeapon(Ent_Gun wep) 
      double jump()
      Decide how fast the character should move upwards
      double movement()
      Decide how much the character should move vertically

    • Method Detail

      • movement

        double movement()
        Decide how much the character should move vertically
        Returns:
        desired horizontal velocity increase as percentage (-1.0 to 1.0) of runPower (subject to physics limitations)

      • jump

        double jump()
        Decide how fast the character should move upwards
        Returns:
        desired upwards horizontal velocity increase as percentage (0.0 to 1.0) of jumpPower subject to normalization and physics)

      • fireWeapon

        boolean fireWeapon(Ent_Gun wep)
        Parameters:
        wep - Weapon to fire
        Returns:
        Return true if weapon should be fired

      • fire2Weapon

        boolean fire2Weapon(Ent_Gun wep)
        Parameters:
        wep - Weapon to fire
        Returns:
        Return true if weapon secondary fire should be fired
